title: The PVP.net Patcher kernel Problem
body: Hi , after trying to reinstall lol today, becasue only the new client worked for me, i reinstalled and while installing it stopped in the middle. I Uninstalled and when i tried to install 2nd time ,i got the PVP.net patcher kernel stopped msg. i tried everything I saw online as solutions .After nothing worked, I formated my pc, still same problem. the hextech repair failed to reinstall, so im out of ideas.

replies.body: actually im having the same problem and nothing in that list works

This kernel error can be a common error if your PC settings or something else is blocking your game files from being accessed.  Go through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow an exception for league.  Let me know if this helps!
